
# Basic Matches

1. Matching exact strings
```{r, message=FALSE}
x<- c("apple", "banana", "pear")

str_view(x,"an")


```
2. Matching any character.
shows only first match in a string). Here, any thing that surrounds the letter a wil be matched 
```{r, message=FALSE}
str_view(x, ".a.")
```
3. Matching a "." (dot) 

```{r, message=FALSE}
dot <- "\\."
writeLines(dot)
x<- c("abc", "a.c", "bef")
str_view(x, "a\\.c")
```
4. Matching a "\" (escape)

```{r, message=FALSE}
x<- "a\\b"
writeLines(x)
str_view(x, "\\\\")
```
